name: stonekin.project
description: Stonekin SDK - Development tooling and workspace configuration

scripts.dev:up: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.dev:down: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.dev:rebuild: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml build --no-cache
scripts.dev:logs: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml logs -f
scripts.dev:shell: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml exec ${CLAUDE_USER}-stonekin-dev zsh
scripts.dev:clean: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down -v
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:down && npm run dev:up
scripts.dev:status: CLAUDE_USER=${CLAUDE_USER:?CLAUDE_USER environment variable is required} docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml ps
